sources.src/Register.vue:
<template>
  <form class="form-signup" @submit.prevent="register">
    <label class="text-dark font-weight-bold" for="register-name"
      >Full Name</label
    >
    <input
      v-model="name"
      required
      type="name"
      class="form-styling"
      placeholder="e.g John Doe"
    />
    <label class="text-dark font-weight-bold" for="register-email"
      >Email Address</label
    >
    <input
      v-model="email"
      required
      type="email"
      class="form-styling"
      placeholder="example@email.com"
    />
    <label class="text-dark font-weight-bold" for="register-password"
      >Password</label
    >
    <input v-model="password" required type="password" class="form-styling" />
    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-success mt-2">Register</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "Register",
  data() {
    return {
      name: "",
      email: "",
      password: "",
    };
  },
  methods: {
    register() {
      const payload = {
        name: this.name,
        email: this.email,
        password: this.password,
      };
      this.$emit("requestRegister", payload);
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style>
</style>
